item.title: TSGCTF2021 RE WP
item.description: Beginners Rev 用 fork() 遍历了 32 位输入，每个输入都分别进行一次函数运算 do { ++v2; if ( !fork() ) { v2 = 0; v1 |= 1 << v3; v7 = open("/dev/null", 1); dup2(v7, 1); } ++v3; } while ( v3 != 5 ); 每个函数运算都是将输入迭代好多次 v4 = (unsigned __int8 *)&key + a2; v5 = v4[2]; v6 = 1; while ( (unsigned int)(-1217102449 * v5 + 1217102449) > 0xB2927C ) { ++v6; v5 += v4[2]; if ( v6 == 367 ) { v6 = -1; break; } } v7 = v4[4]; v8 = v4[3] * ((a1 + *v4) % 367 * v4[1] % 367 * v6 % 367) % 367; 被retaddr坑了一会，后面才反应过来开头那个 if ( retaddr - (_BYTE *)check !
